website_summaries.verdict: This grow tent has some nice features and is easy to set up. However, like some other models, the zipper could be better.
pros: Made of tough Mylar material that is very reflective and promotes plant growth
Well-made window allows you to keep an eye on your plants' progress
Includes a removable floor tray and tool bag
Comes with instructions that are easy to follow, making setup simple
cons: Light tends to leak in around the seams

customer_reviews.title: Even an old lady can put this together
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 72 YO woman, 5'6" and 129 lbs and I assembled this 96" x 48" grow tent all by myself. The frame was easy. Pulling the tent over the frame was a challenge and would have been easier with another person helping. I stood on a sturdy step stool and pulled the top over the frame. The last bottom corner would not fit over the frame; but my large shoe horn did the trick, allowing the tent to slip over that last corner. There were no tears, no broken zippers, or other problems. I'm happy and ready to grow 15 medicine plants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size reference photo 48x48x80
customer_reviews.text: Very happy as per description easy assembly. I have attached photos for size reference, I am bad at gauging size in photos, hopefully these will help someone understand the size of this grow tent. The chair in the photo is a standard canvas fold-in chair.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia H

customer_reviews.title: Good size tent for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This grow tent was super easy to put together no tools needed ! I love the 4 vent socks that can easily be plugged up when not in use to contain light. The silver lining inside the tent does a good job reflecting my grow light. It comes with 4 adjustable length straps to hang any light from the ceiling cross brackets. I love the mesh storage pockets to keep my extra straps and trimmer organized. The day I ordered this tent Amazon just happened to be offering a lightning deal 15% off. So far I’m very happy with this he tent. I’ll update if I have problems later on.
customer_reviews.author: fitnessguy

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved and set up without breaking a sweat. The instructions for my tent 32×32×63 were easy to read follow and understand the material is thick and light proof has 3 6 inch vent holes and 1 4 inch hole and a rectangle screened vent on the bottom viewing window on front zipper works good so far i will update once i get my grow going. *UPDATE* after getting going i noticed that there is pinhole light leaks outside at the seams. They are however very minor and small and hardly noticable still pitch dark when i go inside the tent and shut it. Changed from 5 star to 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first...
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about this tent at first, but once it arrived, all doubt was removed. The material itself is well made. The stitching is near perfect all around. Frame is sturdy and currently holding 2 XXL reflectors with no issues at all. 10/10 would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the grow tent
customer_reviews.text: As a new grower, after a few days research, I decided to buy OPULENT SYSTEMS grow tent since they have the nice and clear presentations. It is over my expectations.Perfect size ,durable quality and easy to assemble. I am so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: ZIPPERS ARE NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money zipper came broken does not seal 100% can not run photo strains in this now 👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.author: kidd babin

customer_reviews.title: Set me back again.
customer_reviews.text: Sent 10 A poles and no actual D poles, what the heck? The D poles are just massive hanging bars, not even connexting pieces, got 2 minutes into assembling before realized something was wrong. Had to go drop 100 extra to get a mars hydro since this took a week and a half to get to my house. Genuinely pissed. Lots of good reviews so im bummed. My mars hydro is 2 inches taller and much more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is tidy and very well-labeled, and was easy to put together. Material is heavy and feel high quality, no mis-stitches or other construction issues. In a fully-dark room (garage) I can't see any light from outside while bright full-spectrum white lights are on inside. I'm using it as grow house for veggie seedlings, and with an HLG panel and a circulation fan they're getting big in a hurry. It's a great tent
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Darius

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't 100% trap light
customer_reviews.text: This is the second tent from the same manufacturer that I've purchased. My first tent was great no issues. My second tent is full of pin holes that light escapes from. Without exaggeration there's hundreds of holes. it's not necessarily hard to put up but where I have placed it in the room I had to put so much effort into it I'm not going to be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm! no more problems with nosy neighbors...
customer_reviews.text: You know when you're growing winter vegetables in your basement and your nosy neighbors is like "whatcha growing in your basement? eh?!?! wink wink nudge nudge!" and you say "Vegetables! Dude!" and he says "oh, do you think I might get some of those veggies?" Well worry no more with this tent they won't see the light, they won't see the plants and to top it all off it makes the whole growing stuff in your basement thing oh so much easier. need I say more? Get a grow tent! get this grow tent!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Different Manufacturer?
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed in this tent. The video speaks for itself. The reason I purchase this brand again! because I didn't have any problems with the 4X4 larger tent which has the white poles. The top of the tent slipped on fine, but the bottom is totally off. Just really killed my schedule of growing my plants. RETURN 2 SENDER!
customer_reviews.author: Woodstock

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out Vivosun
customer_reviews.text: This tent is high quality in every since of the word. It lives up to its description 100%. Its assembly wasn't the easiest but thats on me not the seller nor tent. Though it wasn't the easiest it wasn't too difficult to figure out where I went wrong in order to assemble it correctly. I was so excited after receiving it that I rushed to open up all the poles without reading which ones were which. However the poles had small alphabet characters on them which in turn helped me correct my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent, great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for growing seedlings and rooting plumeria cuttings indoors. Great tent that zios up pretty airtight. No light leaks when everything is closed up. It takes 2 people to get to cover on, but it wasn't difficult. Only complaint is the corners of the viewing window need to be reinforced. They are already pulling away from the tent, so I had to sew them back down with stronger thread.
customer_reviews.author: SGT & HURICN

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Bad zippers
customer_reviews.text: Set up for first time use failry easy. Unzipped right side door, halfway up one side appeared crushed into place and will not zip past this point. This leaves this entire structure useless. Door inoperable, light leaks, air gaps... The other zippers all around this tent are operable but not easily. Aside from the zipper issue there are also small light leaks at multiple points a from the inside.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts couldn’t build tent box had missing set of poles
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Great tent and the customer service even after the sale is amazing. Highly recommend. As added praise, one of the door zippers broke and wouldn't move because the zipper teeth unzipped itself. I put a blanket over the opening and contacted Opulent to see if they had some sort of fix. They asked for photos, which I provided, and a few days later a brand new tent arrived. I love this tent and now I love Opulent. This level of customer service is really very, very rare. If I ever buy another tent it's guaranteed it will be an Opulent. Highly, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Get a different one.
customer_reviews.text: The tent was a pain to assemble and disassemble simply because there was too much friction with the poles. And then the tent had light leaks in the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: huh?

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend the opulent systems tent over the vivosun
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. This is a very good tent. Material quality is very good, more important is the quality of the in the way the stitching and attention to detail. I can't find any light leaks anywhere. I also have another tent by vivosun, leaks light everywhere. All around the zipper, on the corners. There are pin holes on all sides. I will never buy anther vivosun tent.
customer_reviews.author: Linda swope

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay quality, but the zippers constantly get stuck. one of the things that you pull tight to close the hole broke the first time I tried to close it. BIGGGEST PROBLEM ITS 58’ measure it it is not 60 inches. Strait up lying to the consumer.
customer_reviews.author: A2rzros

customer_reviews.title: Bad service, bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The zippers came stuck out of the box, this tent sucks spend your hard earned money somewhere else. Just get the vivosun, atleast they pick up their phones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent but one bad zipper out of four tents
customer_reviews.text: This tent was the best of the best until my zipper got stuck after using it for only a month and a half. When I say best I'm talking about I have bought four of the same brand tents since September 2019 and planned on buying more. I'm sure one out of four isn't bad but I was heartbroken lol. Can't beat the price for the quality. Hopefully I can try and fix the zipper and wish this company would make larger tents as well to compete with Gorilla so I can by more and grow more.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Minor light leaks.
customer_reviews.text: This tent was SUPER easy to set up. Only took me about five minutes and instructions were super clear. Almost everything about this tent is perfect, until I get it set up turn my light on and realize that there are 3 maybe more light leaks throughout the front and back Material. I’ve just used duct tape to cover these up and that’s keeping the light out just fine. Like I said would Be a. Perfect tent if it weren’t for the leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Botwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my indoor garden. It holds up to 4 of the 3 gallon potted plant buckets that I have in it currently. When your plants are on a specific light cycle and you want to make sure no added light gets to them, this tent does the trick! It has helped keep my cats away from my plants, and even is sturdy enough that when my curious cats jump on top of the tent, the tent is still standing and not caved in.
customer_reviews.author: Pita

customer_reviews.title: Wow - high quality and really easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It's sturdy, easy to put together and is much better quality than I initially expected. I'm only disappointed I didn't get a larger version. I currently have it in my basement and am using it to house a mushroom grow chamber. I have shiitake and blue oysters spawning right now. I'm planning on buying a second larger one to fruit the mushrooms. My only recommendation is to get one as big as you might need. You won't be disappointed in the quality and it might inspire you to go bigger.
customer_reviews.author: DKeezy

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is good
customer_reviews.text: Had a few complications with the first tent and it had a hole in it. talked with customer service, and through little time was able to get another shipped free of charge. Great customer service. One idea I have would maybe be labeling the plastic that’s wrapping the poles with what letter they are to ease confusion. That would help a ton. Or even a sticker on each or something.
customer_reviews.author: lilysman

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Grow Tent !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little grow tent. I ordered the 32 x32. I love it!! I purchased for my basement, because my basement is a little to cold to start my plants. I all so purchase a LED grow light and the grow tent holds the heat in very well. Just in the two days that I have had the tent my plants have grown 2 inches. I am so very happy with this purchase. I recommend this grow tent. They do come in a variety of size's. I plan on trying to grow a tomato plant, and a pepper plant over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly really surprised when I was putting this together at how sturdy it seemed, especially for the price. The material is pretty heavy-duty, the mylar interior seems durable, the instructions were well written, etc. I've been using it for several months and everything's holding up. The removable waterproof tray on the bottom comes in handy. My only minor complaint would be that I wish there was a way to lock the top braces in place to keep them from moving when you strap lights or fans to them, but that's a pretty minor problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had my tent for several weeks and used the main door most of the time when opening the tent, however one day when trying to open a side door, one of the zippers got stuck and broke off. I came to realize that the zipper part itself had a wave in it and no matter how hard you tried it wouldn’t open past that point, thus rendering the door useless. However after contacting opulent and sending them some pictures, they promptly sent me a replacement! I chose this tent over other brands from past experiences due to no light leaks! Highly recommend opulent tents to anyone looking to get into home growing
customer_reviews.author: Patty Mulvihill

customer_reviews.title: Quality bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This is my first grow tent, and i am very satisfied. Very very easy to assemble, while not necessary i would recommend a second set of hands to slide the tent onto the frame. Definitely sturdy, had my 40 lb toddler hang from the bars with no issues, pay the extra couple of dollars and get metal connector pieces. Zipped myself inside and was pitch dark, could not find any pin holes. Zippers, tent, and poles all feel like quality materials. Overall very impressed, if your looking for a beginner tent i highly recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Zukauskas

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Took just under an hour to assemble. I followed the instructions and unzipped the casing before putting it on and there are no zipper leaks. What you see are holes for the hose, which I don't use. Sometimes you have to put your finger under the zipper to make sure it doesn't get caught on the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Carper

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a easy to set up and get running 4x4 tent then this one is for you. The poles are not the best quality but if your not hanging a ton of weight in this then you are good. Easy to set up. Easy to use. Peek window so you don’t always have to zip and unzip. Not to bad of a price. If I needed another one I would order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for 50$ other posts for more. I love this tent!!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is AWESOME for 50$ super nice quality. The material is thick isn’t thin like some of the others I’ve seen before. The zipper is durable and sturdy. Comes with straps and has the pocket inside for storage. Mat on the floor for easy clean up. if you’re just starting out this tent is perfect for you. I’m already looking to get a taller one I’m hooked on growing!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Best tent I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is very very nice like next level nice! I was blown away at how easy it was to assemble. This tent is made of quality materials I had this tent assembled in about 35 minutes. The interior is very reflective and makes lights shine inside! I will always buy from Opulent Systems!
customer_reviews.author: Shayni Brown

customer_reviews.title: Solid tent for plant camping
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble with use of directions. Quality materials from shell to poles. Would like one more cross beam to make 4 total, but I can make it work for my setup. No light leak, stitching is good, should last years if use. Zippers are quality and feel like they will hold up. 2x2x4 works for my personal grow station, and I would buy it again if I go larger.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: 2x4x6 ft tent perfect size for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: this was a FAST delivery. Very easy assembly, really good sturdy material, zipper, seems light tight. Holds 4 3gal buckets but rally best for 2 or 3 so they have room to grow. Love this size, sturdiness and size. I might order another for the basement, takes little space. you could probably put in a closet if you want concealment. LOVE PRODUCT -GREAT PRICE!!
customer_reviews.author: Seasoned Music lover

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure, hearty and functional.
customer_reviews.text: The tent material is thick and hearty. I love the closed system with plenty of access ports. There’s no stray lights showing and the zipper is very sturdy. The framework is a little thin and shaken but once the tent is placed around it, it’s secure. Great size choices as well.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.text: I love opulent, didn’t expect such good customer service.. but there’s is certainly top notch! Have been growing tomatoes, cilantro, jalapenos, lavender and loving my tents! Well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf quality for entry level prices!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a state where medical cannabis is legal and there are growing supply shops available on every other street corner. I have researched the majority of brands for grow tents. Opulent Systems provides the quality of the $1,200.00 - $1,500.00 for a small fraction of the price. Thank you Opulent Systems!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Edit......bought a second 2x4 because the quality and price were too great to pass up seriously buy opulent you wont be disappointed!!! I chose this brand after weeks of reading reviews. With that said opulent did a great job with this tent. The material is very thick and seems very durable and putting it together was a breeze. Slight light leak on the zipper but not substantial enough to do any harm I dont think. Time will tell on that.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: A gift for a friend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend, She said it was easy to assemble. I checked it out and there is no light leak and perfect for her one plant under a 300w LED.
customer_reviews.author: William Bone

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This is prob the best tent I have bought out of 6 different brands sold on amazon. I dont know if it's because it's the smallest tent I've bought but it is very well built , almost no light leak at all on it just a tiny bit on the door zipper but litterly the best tent for the money that I've gotten so far . Maybe will try out one of there bigger tents the next time I need 1
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: V2.0
customer_reviews.text: This tent was perfect and easy to assemble with two people coming from a man. more so because us men want to get things done in a fashionable amount of time but are heavy handed. This is perfect to put together with a lady or your partner. If you have patience, do it yourself. This tent is not for spoiled brats who had everything given to them as in, the tent is durable but still can rip. so dont complain when your bein dumb and it rips. BURN LOOSE THREADS FOR RELIABILITY!!! LIKE A SHOE OR THAT JACKET OR BELT.
customer_reviews.author: drone

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious
customer_reviews.text: Very large! Very spacious inside, almost too much space for our needs, but is working out great. Both my husband and I can walk and work freely, with plenty of room. Zippers have gotten stuck while zipping since day 1, and there was a small fray in the green threading on the front (only effects the appearance), however we may have created that damage during unpacking. If the zipper functioned more smoothly, I wouldn't be nervous about it being sturdy but thats the only reason I can't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is as good or better than some of the tents that are twice the price. High quality with lots of decent features. I wish there was a designated port to run power cables through but you cant have it all at this price.
customer_reviews.author: sharkonomist

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the grow tent, it's pretty thick sturdy material. The poles are kinda funky, but once you wrap the tent around it, it stiffens right up. What I'm not happy about is one of the zippers is jacked up and they shorted me a deep bar or the bar you hang your lights off of. But for around $75 what do you expect. The efficiency of the tent is good.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Good tent
customer_reviews.text: This was my first tent I bought to start growing plants in. Hasn't disappointed. Bought a cheaper brand and it ripped almost immediately. The 32x32 is a pretty good deal and has been on sale before.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This tent is a steal for the price! It’s sturdy metal framework will hold a decent amount of weight and has lots of venting options. The fabric and zippers seem really high quality. I’d definitely recommend and buy again. its impressive for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and materials are of high quality. Unfortunately most of the seams let too much light through. I'm going to be using the tent in a room that is dark when the tent lights are off but I wouldn't flower in the tent if the room was lit.
customer_reviews.author: Fisha lot

customer_reviews.title: This is the highest quality tent out there.
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy any other tent, the green accents to the tent and brand are very eye appealing, the sturdiness is as good as it gets. Many vents for any intake or exhaust, 3 hangers, and the zipper doesn't leak light at all, and it's very smooth. Tried a cheaper tent and went back to opulent within a day, this is the best tent you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great tent so far. I've been using it for around 8 months and it has given me no problems. I only took one star off for quality material because the zipper is finnicky sometimes but it hasn't broken yet so I'm overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Quality for the price is great. The tent is sturdy and has plenty of ports into the tent placed in convenient spots. I put it together by myself and Looking back it’d make for easier assembly with two people pulling it over the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for keeping my tropical plants over winter in the Midwest! Very simple to assemble even with just one person! Seems to be good quality material and sturdy frame. The only thing I will add to it is some velcro on the exterior to mount an electrical strip plug/surge protector.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Quality is way higher than the price they charge.
customer_reviews.text: No pin holes that I can see. No tears of fabric inside or out. Very reflective mylar. Zipper has a tendency to get stuck if you don't hold the flap as you zip upwards. But it's nothing to get the hang of how to zip it. Noce quality all the ay around.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for first time grower
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time on amazon for which tent was the best. I liked this products reviews and decided to go for it. I will say it Is exactly what I wanted. I will say it has a little bit thinner material than my other tent but you would have to be uncaring to rip it. I also did have a slightly bent end piece due to shipping, but I called customer service and they sent a new part right away. My ladies are very happy with the Opulent tent. Also n a side note, I love the teal/black outside colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck, great tent
customer_reviews.text: Entry level tent, works great. Have (4) 600w LEDS hanging, 8" Exhaust fan and carbon filter hanging, 2 oscillating fans hanging with no troubles. Durable, zipper works great. Could always be a little sturdier but for the price it seems very fair. Great tent overall.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice grow house. This was my 1st grown tent. It seems good quality and with my 600 watt Light in it and zipped up i can see any light showing!!! Im liking it lets see how my plants like it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Product material showing deficiencies with 1 month usage.
customer_reviews.text: Problem, I did put it together by myself was simple to complete. Large, room, and plenty of access for accessories via design. Numerous arrangements for fan or other things to fit inside. I have noticed multiple light leaks on the seams and zipper areas over the past few weeks. Quality at initial install looked great but overall had to reduce my initial review back down to a average product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It is a tent but not a true 80" in height, more like 78"
customer_reviews.text: Tent went up easily like most do and it is a nice tent for the price range but it is not a true 80" in height like it is advertised. True measurement with the tent on the pole and set up is 78" and it sits next to another one that is 80". Material is decent and works again for the price range, has all the right vent holes and the zippers and seems work as long as you set it up just like they say and not stretch it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice tent. In this one the mylar is much more reflective than the ZAZZY tents I have. Pretty easy set up unless it's your first one. Then take your time if so. Otherwise it seems well made and it's a nice grow tent. Can't go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Better  tent than vivosun!!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a low quality product because of price. But let me tell u best tent i have had better than vivosun the material feels better the stiching is top notch. And altough i see like two pin holes light leaks best bang for your bucks!! Easy to assemble with 2 people. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light leaks
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pinhole light leaks through tent and the zippers. Quality is good on thickness but frame seems weaker than my other tent. Will be returning due to light leaks which sucks because i love the look n color of tent
customer_reviews.author: Cosmic

customer_reviews.title: Some light leaks and loose stitching. But overall good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tent. I love the color and it was easy to setup. My only complaint after 6 months of use is that there are some pin hole light leaking along the zippers in a few areas. A couple of the stitching are comming loose and I had to melt them in hope they do not get worse. The ports and main door are more than enough to access the inside and I have not had a water leak with the inside liner tray. Overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Have had the tent for like 2 months now it hold humidity and heat great but one of the zippers has messed up and doesn't open or close the track ***Update been close to a year now and we got the zipper working and haven't had any issues still holds humidity and heat and the cwd that lives in it is getting huge
customer_reviews.author: bulltr79

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: This is just as good if not better than some of the more expensive ones. These things are never 100% light leak proof but this one is acceptable. Great directions and for a lightning deal of $84.99 it cant be beat, even for the $99.
customer_reviews.author: B.S.

customer_reviews.title: Opulent great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised at the quality, excellent tent. Price was awesome. I have some of their 3 gallon fabric pots and love them. Decided to try this tent and I am impressed. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: shawn shank

customer_reviews.title: I'll pass this down to my children.  It's that well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is a super value. I am so impressed with the quality. I was afraid for the price it would be flimsy. But I was wrong. This thing is well built. It will last a lifetime. Highly recommended. Buy yours today you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Blake T Barber

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This grow tent is exactly what I needed. It locks in light and is just as sturdy as all of the top end tents. It is made from quality material and is clearly made to last!! I will be buying more Opulent Systems grow tents 100%!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Big wide.. can get a lot of plants in here.. and I'm just getting started
customer_reviews.text: Just put it up.. great tent to grow anything.. only thing is.. decide where you want it.. cause if you put it up in your living room, like me.. your gonna have to take the top off to get it in your room.. I honestly thought I could put this on my desk😂
customer_reviews.author: C. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tents
customer_reviews.text: This is my second opulent tent I have purchased, they are extremely well built and high quality for the price. My 24x24x48 was flawless, the 32x32x60 was cluttered with trimmings from whoever sewed the accent trim on and a couple loose threads but 99.99% flawless. I would buy another one without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy design with good solid materials. Wish it came with more vents, specifically on the bottom end. As the only 3 that there are, are all on the top side. Works well over all though. I have the 2x2x4 which is good for seedlings and vegging but collects a lot of heat due to the smaller size. cant go wrong with going with the next size up though. Overall i like it, id purchase the brand again. Easy to assemble and easy to just pick up and move around and or tear it down and travel with it to your next destination.
customer_reviews.author: Kush

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Surprised !!! So Happy!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this tent I honestly expected it to have some minor issues. The cost was so good for a tent this size (massive) that I thought they would have to cut some corners. This thing is sturdy, made of great materials and had instructions (model specific instructions). No missing or mislabeled pieces... Seriously could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Harley Procell

customer_reviews.title: Good materials
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled last night. So far I think it's great! Easy to assemble with 2 people. No light leaks from the inside or out. Very good quality of outside material, reflective inside, poles, and zipper. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Best Tent I Own
customer_reviews.text: Best tent ive had thus far. Well put together with no light leaks whatsoever! Better than my Vivosun tent which cost more. Go figure. Definitely recommend 👌 Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Brown

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper doesn’t seal the light inside, so the light leaks through the zipper. I had to use some tape to cover it. Also the “windows” that are made of plastic were wrinkled and they stayed like that. This one wasn’t well built. Everything else was OK.
customer_reviews.author: Stephano Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Zippers Broke
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The zippers broke off with less than 3 months of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Derpcola

customer_reviews.title: Decent starter ten
customer_reviews.text: This Tent initially felt sturdy, but using a carbon filter inside and the edges of the tent have started seeping light outward. Spotty but obvious. Will absolutely do the job. But think of it as a "Starter" tent. Good for someone who is starting out and figuring out what they want to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. It was very easy to assemble and is super lite, so moving around if needed is super easy. Reason for 4 stars is because it has about 10 pinholes in the fabric that allow light to escape. Not really a big deal since temp/humidity keep the same inside. Overall would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adi Leon

customer_reviews.title: Zippers stuck
customer_reviews.text: The tent is great, I hear ppl bitching about stuck zippers, quick tip don’t force them, just make sure, it’s straight meaning no material in front of it before zipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great 4x8, sturdy material,
customer_reviews.text: Great size and quality tent. Thick material, holds light in well with slot of vent holes to run lines in and out. Tent didn't take long to put up,good to have an extra hand with pulling tent material over the frame but easy to do with two people. Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: No light leaks
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller tent, the quality of this tent is by far better then my last tent I purchased on here, went together fast, no light leakage and heavy material, love this tent
customer_reviews.author: Dounia

customer_reviews.title: Instructions
customer_reviews.text: You could have taken a few more minutes on the instructions, they say a picture is worth a thousand words, I don't know if figure A is the roof or the side, since you are talking about the roof, well that wasn't the roof, that is the side, anyways the instructions need to be re-worked, other than that after 2 1/2 hrs. I have a nice looking grow tent set-up the materials are all good quality
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Nice lil tent, for micro grows or a good single harvest. I will keep you guys updated on the progress as time goes on. So far it's doing well, no light leaks at all, I just need to buy some adjustable hanging clips for my grow light and it should all go well.
customer_reviews.author: DerpCloud187

customer_reviews.title: Zipper was a Ripper...
customer_reviews.text: This tent was a great price on a lightning deal. Great quality on the materials as ive been through countless tents in the past. But the zipper on one of the doors broke in just 2 weeks!!! (which was opened every 3 days)Super bummed. Obviously just took the hit vs the pain of taking it down/boxing it up for return. I will try not to shop opulent in the future unless they can make this right someway, somehow? Lets find out...
customer_reviews.author: chris olson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy/ Good material/ Many light leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and strong. BUT and it’s a big but there many and I mean many leaks in this tent. I would not buy again for that fact. But if your not worried about light leaks then go for it. It’s a good tent beside the leaks.
customer_reviews.author: blaine209

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent with Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what an easy tent to setup. All of the parts are clearly labeled and the instructions are very clear. The Tent posts and connectors are all metal and the shell is definitely rugged thick vinyl. In my opinion, Opulent got everything right on this one.
customer_reviews.author: earthworm jim

customer_reviews.title: Great tent, no light leakage and great price
customer_reviews.text: Owned quite a few tents and most important thing in my opinion is light leakage. We’ve owned 3 of these tents and just ordered a 4th and have yet to have any issues. I like this one over other because the door to access your plants is situated lower which in turn makes it easier to do your work and not bend over as much as other. Plus this tent is about $25 cheaper than others of the same quality. Will but again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is made from nice, thick material, metal poles, sturdy zipper. The lining is highly reflective. Someone actually thought about the design and production of it. Don't buy the cheapest one you see on Amazon, buy a name brand from Opulent and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: k mac

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price and quality it has no light leaks, is air tight, metal bars not plastic also real easy to set up Carbon filter straps came in cluch really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JohnG

customer_reviews.title: Grow tent
customer_reviews.text: Never give anything but 5 star reviews, overall the tent is great, the darn zippers forever get caught, so I need to fight to get it closed, almost worthless if I can't close, everyday, if I didn't absolutely need it I'd be returning
customer_reviews.author: John T. Kesil

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, I assembled with help and it went together really smooth. Everything worked as described and the material is nice and seems quality made! Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin M. Small

customer_reviews.title: Bang for Buck
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a high quality tent. Obviously can't be compared to Gorilla or anything, but they're sturdy made with good fabric and mylar. All of the features function well. Not really much more to be said about it, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Alongi

customer_reviews.title: Great For Indoor Growing.
customer_reviews.text: Material was Super thick and sturdy. Zippers were large and strong. No light visible when its closed. Sturdy enough to hold most equipment. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shreds Snappy Comebacks

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, no light leakage and good quality material. Was missing a non essential piece, called the number provided on a customer services call and heard back within an hour. I chose to not stress them with the missing part because it works fine for my needs without it. Great customer service and good product.
customer_reviews.author: Yung S.

customer_reviews.title: Tent
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up very sturdy light does leaked a little bit but not as bad as some other tents I am happy with it had it for about 2 months I would recommend it to any one
customer_reviews.author: ANT

customer_reviews.title: Awsome tent!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tent!!! For muti purposes im using mine as and enclosure for my Columbian gold Tegu I was having problem with humidity this thing keeps humidity crazy well. Well worth the money material is well made very strong compared to others I've seen on the market definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like that it was easy to put up ..seems like a good quality material but the stitching not so good ..one of the Velcro corners on the liner at the bottom was not stitched probably, so that corner doesn't attach to the pole and the Hem on the back side of the zipper is not lined up with the zipper all the way around , it allows daylight to escape/enter the tent and the zipper gets caught on on that same hem . I was going to purchase another but I think I'll look around a bit more
customer_reviews.author: colby cox

customer_reviews.title: A must have !!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to assemble. It looks great! It's a must have for anyone looking for this kind of in door grow tent. It's were I'll start and stop looking for a tent. I'm very satisfied :) I can't stop looking though the nice big observation window :)
customer_reviews.author: She who must not be named

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent, well made, heavy duty zipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 24x24x48 size. The tent is well made. Great zipper. Big door. I bought the smallest one so it would fit inside a closet for a totally stealthy grow. It would be nice if it was a bit taller, say 5 feet but that's not the tent fault. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Arachnid

customer_reviews.title: 2×4
customer_reviews.text: Had the 2×2 and decided to go up to the 2×4. They are both awsome in my opinion. I go with Opulent because I believe there vent/duct holes are the best placement out of what I have seen. The only COMPLAINT I have is the top cross bars move alot, but I believe that's so you can move your lights back and forth. still need maybe a peice of rubber or something to steady it up.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan
